mapper.select:
SELECT distinct ann.total_title AS totaltitle, rp.rnd_task_no as rndtaskno, et.eval_completed_at as evalcompletedat, rp.task_name as taskname, rp.rnd_institution as rndinstitution, (select name from member where mem_no = rp.mem_no) as name, (select name from member where mem_no = et.mem_no) as etname, (select affil_type from member where mem_no = et.mem_no) as affiltype, (select affil_dept from member where mem_no = et.mem_no) as affildept, (select position from member where mem_no = et.mem_no) as position, rp.rnd_plan_no as rndplanno, evt.form_type as formtype, qu.type as type FROM announcement ann INNER JOIN sub_announcement sa on ann.ann_no = sa.ann_no inner join rnd_plan rp on rp.sub_ann_no = sa.sub_ann_no inner join eval_task et on et.rnd_plan_no = rp.rnd_plan_no inner join announcement_evaluation ae on ae.sub_ann_no = sa.sub_ann_no inner join evaluation_table evt on evt.evaluation_table_no = ae.evaluation_table_no inner join evaluation_question eq on eq.evaluation_table_no = evt.evaluation_table_no inner join question qu on qu.question_no = eq.question_no
where rp.rnd_plan_no = #{rndPlanNo} and qu.type NOT IN ('공통')
mapper.insert: insert into eval_score (eval_score_no, score, eval_committee_no, rnd_plan_no,mem_no,evaluation_table_no) values (seq_eval_score.NEXTVAL, #{score}, #{evalCommitteeNo}, #{rndPlanNo}, #{memNo}, #{evaluationTableNo})
